channel.title: EBPF on Mussell Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in EBPF on Mussell Portfolio

item.title: Implementing Cilium with eBPF for Advanced Kubernetes Networking
item.description: Deep dive into Cilium’s eBPF-powered networking and security capabilities. Exploring how eBPF enables advanced network policies, load balancing, and observability at the kernel level.

item.title: eBPF for System Observability: Monitoring Linux Systems at the Kernel Level
item.description: Leveraging eBPF for advanced system observability and monitoring. This project demonstrates how to use eBPF programs to trace system calls, monitor network traffic, and gain deep insights into application behavior without modifying kernel code.
